name: crashreporter
description: Dump node context into a file on process crash, send it by mail

scripts.pretest: jsrevival -p "describe, it" -o "properties: false, maxlen: 0, debug: false, bitwise: false, eqeq: false, newcap: false, undef: false, unparam: false, vars: false" -r cli-hide-valid -R lib/ test/
